data.name: Immersion Chess
data.detailed_description:
Immerse yourself in the most realistic virtual representation of the classic game of Chess!

Play against players from all around the world in one of the few available games where VR users can compete with players with standard PCs setups.

Dangerous and cunning AI awaits to be challenged as well.

Immersion Chess are compatible with HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and standard PC with Gear VR and Mobile support coming soon.

The game supports all the official chess rules and provides alternative background scenes.


Immersion Chess will soon be updated with additional maps and features.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
